identificationModule.briefTitle: Neoadjuvant/Adjuvant Tislelizumab Combined With Anlotinib and Platinum Doublet Chemotherapy With Resectable NSCLC
identificationModule.officialTitle: A Phase II, Prospective, Randomized, Open Label, Multi-center Study of Tislelizumab Combined With Anlotinib and Platinum Doublet Chemotherapy as Neoadjuvant/Adjuvant With Resectable Stage II-IIIB Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer

descriptionModule.briefSummary: This is a Phase II, prospective, randomized, open label, controlled, multi-center study, aim to evaluate the activity of Tislelizumab and Anlotinib and chemotherapy compared with Tislelizumab and chemotherapy before surgery, followed by Tislelizumab alone as adjuvant therapy. The primary objective of this study is to evaluate and compare pathological complete response rate(pCR).

armGroups.label: Tislelizumab with anlotinib and platinum-based chemotherapy + Adjuvant Tislelizumab
armGroups.description:
Intervention/treatment:

Tislelizumab 200mg iv，d1，q3w， Anlotinib 10mg，po，qd1-14，q3w， Cisplatin 75 mg/m\^2 by IV infusion Q3W, given on cycle day 1 Carboplatin AUC of 5 on Day 1 of each 3-week cycle Paclitaxel 175mg/m2 on Day 1 of each 3-week cycle(SQ only) Albumin-bound paclitaxel 260mg/m2，on D1 IV infusion Q3W or 130mg/m2 on D1D8 IV infusion Q3W for each cycle(SQ only) Pemetrexed 500 mg/m2 on Day 1 of each 3-week cycle(NSQ only) Adjuvant: 4 weeks(±7 Days) following surgery, participants receive no more than 16 cycles (cycle length: 3 weeks) of Tislelizumab \[200 mg, IV; given on cycle day 1\].

armGroups.label: Tislelizumab with platinum-based chemotherapy + Adjuvant Tislelizumab
armGroups.description: Tislelizumab 200mg iv，d1，q3w， Cisplatin 75 mg/m\^2 by IV infusion Q3W, given on cycle day 1 Carboplatin AUC of 5 on Day 1 of each 3-week cycle Paclitaxel 175mg/m2 on Day 1 of each 3-week cycle(SQ only) Albumin-bound paclitaxel 260mg/m2，on D1 IV infusion Q3W or 130mg/m2 on D1D8 IV infusion Q3W for each cycle(SQ only) Pemetrexed 500 mg/m2 on Day 1 of each 3-week cycle(NSQ only) Adjuvant: 4 weeks(±7 Days) following surgery, participants receive no more than 16 cycles (cycle length: 3 weeks) of Tislelizumab \[200 mg, IV; given on cycle day 1\].

primaryOutcomes.measure: pathological complete response (pCR) in Intent-to-Treat (ITT) analysis set
primaryOutcomes.description: pathological complete response (pCR): defined as no residual tumor cells in the surgically resected tumor specimen and all sampled regional lymph nodes after neoadjuvant treatment.
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: through study completion, an average of 1 year

locations.facility: Tangdu Hospital of the Fourth Millitary Medical University
